title: Incredible flexibility with the power of the gaze - Fascination / Non-verbal hypnosis
description:
Dr. Marco Paret used the power of the gaze - Fascination on three of his students. They entered in a state of Charm and their bodies became incredibly flexible. Dr. Paret travels all round the world to teach the most unique non-verbal hypnosis techniques from the ancient times. Fascination is a subject that has 25 years of researches from Dr. Paret. His student experience, learn and practice the powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques and become professionals. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
